verses.verse: A <S%H8605>Prayer<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H5186>Bow<s%> <S%H5186>down<s%> your <S%H241>ear,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> me: for I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%>
<S%H8104>Preserve<s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> for I am <S%H2623>holy:<s%> O you my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> that <S%H982>trusts<s%> in you.
Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to me, O <S%H136>Lord:<s%> for I <S%H7121>cry<s%> to you <S%H3605>daily.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
<S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant:<s%> for to you, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> do I <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
For you, <S%H136>Lord,<s%> are <S%H2896>good,<s%> and ready to <S%H5546>forgive;<s%> and <S%H7227>plenteous<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H7121>call<s%> on you.
Give <S%H238>ear,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to my <S%H8605>prayer;<s%> and <S%H7181>attend<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications.<s%>
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>trouble<s%> I will <S%H7121>call<s%> on you: for you will <S%H6030>answer<s%> me.
Among the <S%H430>gods<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> like to you, O <S%H136>Lord;<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> are there any works <S%H4639><s%>like to your works.

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H6213>made<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, O <S%H136>Lord;<s%> and shall <S%H3513>glorify<s%> your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
For you are <S%H1419>great,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> things: you are <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H905>alone.<s%>

<S%H3384>Teach<s%> me your <S%H1870>way,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in your <S%H571>truth:<s%> <S%H3161>unite<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3824>heart:<s%> and I will <S%H3513>glorify<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> for ever <S%H5769>more.<s%>
For <S%H1419>great<s%> is your <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> me: and you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H7585>hell.<s%>

O <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H2086>proud<s%> are <S%H6965>risen<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and the <S%H5712>assemblies<s%> of <S%H6184>violent<s%> men have <S%H1245>sought<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> and have not <S%H7760>set<s%> you <S%H5048>before<s%> them.

But you, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> are a <S%H410>God<s%> full of <S%H7349>compassion,<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious,<s%> long <S%H750>suffering,<s%> <S%H639><s%> and <S%H7227>plenteous<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth.<s%>

O <S%H6437>turn<s%> to me, and have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on me; <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H5797>strength<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of your <S%H519>handmaid.<s%>

<S%H6213>Show<s%> me a <S%H226>token<s%> for <S%H2896>good;<s%> that they which <S%H8130>hate<s%> me may <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and be <S%H954>ashamed:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you, <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> have <S%H5826>helped<s%> me, and <S%H5162>comforted<s%> me.
